text: Abu al-As ibn Umayya () was a son of the eponymous progenitor of the Umayyad clan, Umayya ibn Abd Shams. His sons were the following: *Affan, father of Caliph Uthman. *Al-Hakam, the father of the Umayyad caliph Marwan I. *Al- Mughira, maternal great-grandfather of the Umayyad caliph Abd al-Malik ibn Marwan. He also had a daughter: *Safiyya, who bore a daughter of Abu Sufyan named Ramla. Ramla was a wife of Muhammad. == Family tree == ==References== ==External links== *islaam.net Category:6th-century Arabs Category:Banu Umayya
